column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place can honestly do no wrong. Every time I go here I feel like I am at Hamilton. Every aspect of the meal is choreographed and perfectly executed. If given the opportunity to build a cot in the back room and stay for an extended stay
column2: I would. If you don't get the ham and cheese croquettes
column3: you may as well have sat home alone watching the Fyre Festival documentary. Also the butterscotch flan can marry me and leave me for my neighbor. I wouldn't be mad. I will love you forever Cafe Babareeba.
